title: Mango Latin Bistro
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Take-out, Caribbean, Latin, South American, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A variety of veggie choices, including a nacho appetizer made with fried plantains which can be vegetarian or vegan, as well as arepa, patacon, and tropical salad. Sides of black beans, tostones, maduros, white rice, side salads, fries, and sweet potato fries can be vegan without the cheese. Occasional lacto-vegetarian daily special such as empanadas or loaded salad. Full coffee bar, smoothies and frozen drinks, soy available. BYOB. Reservations recommended for Friday evenings. Modern decor with occasional live music.
